Class Application

java.lang.Object
main.model.application.Application
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, UserLookupService
public class Application extends Object implements Serializable, UserLookupService
Represents a BTO application submitted by an applicant.

Tracks the application lifecycle from submission through to approval/booking, and handles withdrawal requests. Maintains associations with the applicant and project through their unique identifiers.

Since:
2025-04-17
See Also:

    • Application

      public Application(String applicationId, String applicantId, String projectName, UserRepository userRepository)
      Constructs a new application with default pending status.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - Unique application ID
      applicantId - NRIC of the applicant
      projectName - Name of the applied project

    • getStatus

      public ApplicationStatus getStatus()
      Returns the current application status.
      Returns:
      One of: "Pending", "Successful", "Unsuccessful", "Booked"

    • setStatus

      public void setStatus(ApplicationStatus newStatus)
      Sets the application status with proper state transitions.
      Parameters:
      newStatus - The new status to set
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if transitioning from a finalized state

    • isFinalized

      public boolean isFinalized()
      Checks if the application is in a finalized state.
      Returns:
      true if status is WITHDRAWN, UNSUCCESSFUL, or BOOKED

    • getFlatType

      public String getFlatType()
      Returns the selected flat type (if booked).
      Returns:
      Flat type or null if not booked

    • setFlatType

      public void setFlatType(String flatType)
      Sets the flat type for booked applications.
      Parameters:
      flatType - The flat type (2-Room/3-Room)

    • isWithdrawalPending

      public boolean isWithdrawalPending()
      Checks if there's a pending withdrawal request.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal is pending approval

      public boolean isWithdrawalApproved()
      Checks if withdrawal was approved.
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal is approved

    • requestWithdrawal

      public boolean requestWithdrawal()
      Initiates a withdrawal request.
      Returns:
      true if request was successfully submitted

      Gets the withdrawal reason for this application.
      Returns:
      The withdrawal reason, or null if not set.
